text: == Events == * September 8 – Stefan Dusan declares himself king of Serbia. * Start of the reign of Emperor Kogon of Japan, first of the Northern Ashikaga Pretenders. * 24 September – Edward Balliol enthroned as King of Scotland. * September 27 – the Battle of Plowce took place. == Births == * Coluccio Salutati, Florentine political leader (died 1406) == Deaths == * January 14 – Odoric, Italian explorer * October 27 – Abulfeda, Arab historian and geographer (born 1273)
